casebody.data:
In the Matter of the Involuntary Termination of the Parent-Child Relationship of: J.J. (Minor Child),
and
L.J. (Father), Appellant-Respondent,
v.
The INDIANA DEPARTMENT OF CHILD SERVICES, Appellee-Petitioner,
and
Child Advocates, Inc., Guardian ad Litem. Court of Appeals Case No. 18A-JT-3025 Court of Appeals of Indiana. FILED June 24, 2019

Unpublished Memorandum Decision

Affirmed.
